actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to exempt certain small governmental units from certain public hearing requirements.

summary.text: Exempts specified State or local governments from conforming to specified public hearing provisions of the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972, in the event that holding such a hearing is unreasonably burdensome in relation to the revenue sharing funds to be received by such government.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to exempt certain small governmental units from certain public hearing requirements.
